public class CodePanel
extends Panel
CodePanel.java creates a canvas for drawing code on. supports font sizes, and a scrollbar. reads code from

Version:
99.3.1
Author:
Brian Maltzan

CodePanel(Sim)
adds code canvas and scrollbar.

draw_code(int)
check if code to be displayed is already on the screen.
draw_scrolling(int)
displays code with line selected at top of code canvas.
erase_code_window()
erases the code window.
getInsets()
getPreferredSize()
paint(Graphics)
reset()
erase canvas, set scrollbar to 0.
set_font_size(int)
sets the font size of the code window to the size specified.
set_scrollbar_range(int)
set the scrollbar from 0 to lines.
setup_for_drawing()
gets the current font metrics.
update(Graphics)

CodePanel 
 public CodePanel(Sim s)
adds code canvas and scrollbar.

setup_for_drawing 
 public void setup_for_drawing()
gets the current font metrics. sets up an array of offsets for drawing the lines of code.

draw_code 
 public void draw_code(int line_num)
check if code to be displayed is already on the screen. if so, redraw old line if still on screen, then redraw new line highlighted. else redraw canvas with selected line at top.

draw_scrolling 
 public void draw_scrolling(int line_num)
displays code with line selected at top of code canvas.

erase_code_window 
 public void erase_code_window()
erases the code window.

set_font_size 
 public void set_font_size(int size)
sets the font size of the code window to the size specified. calls set_for_drawing. calls draw_scrolling.

paint 
 public void paint(Graphics g)
Overrides:
paint in class Container
set_scrollbar_range 
 public void set_scrollbar_range(int lines)
set the scrollbar from 0 to lines.

reset 
 public void reset()
erase canvas, set scrollbar to 0.

update 
 public void update(Graphics g)
Overrides:
update in class Container

 public Insets getInsets()
Overrides:
getInsets in class Container
